author: jkuhnert
msg: The "hacky" way that ComponentEventInvoker was finding a targeted component instance finally caught up with me.   Replaced hack with use of IComponent.getIdPath() && IPage.getNestedComponent().

msg: renamed HttpRequestDecodingState to HttpRequestDecodingStateMchine because it's a StateMachine
